title: Delhi HC tells X to comply with directive to remove Congress leaders’ tweets against Rajat Sharma
comments: I am curious, what can the HC or Indian Judiciary do in case X refuses to comply with their directives? I mean, it's a multi-billion dollar company. Would they summon Elon Musk? Does he even fall under their jurisdiction? Genuinely curious.

the dictator passed a law last time that big media companies need to have a indian representative in india. whenever the media company doesnt listen, they just arrest one of the Indian representatives
Yeah maximum they can suspend services of twitter from India.
